==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Hitomi is a shrine maiden from the Grand Narukami Shrine. During the [[Test of Courage (Event Quest)]] and [[Haunted Tales]], she is only named as "Shrine Maiden" and her name was only revealed on the latter part of [[Akitsu Kimodameshi]] event.
